snippet.title: Viewfinder - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description: Take a look at gameplay from Viewfinder, an upcoming mind-bending first-person adventure game in which you can bring pictures to life by placing them into the world. Challenge perception, redefine reality, and reshape the world around you with an instant camera. Viewfinder will be available on PlayStation 5 and Steam in 2023.
